solution_line_template: His playlist currently has a playtime of {num_3_min_songs} songs * {duration_3_min_song} minutes = <<{num_3_min_songs}*{duration_3_min_song}={playtime_3_min_songs}>>{playtime_3_min_songs} minutes from 3-minute songs.

It also has a playtime of {num_2_min_songs} songs * {duration_2_min_song} minutes = <<{num_2_min_songs}*{duration_2_min_song}={playtime_2_min_songs}>>{playtime_2_min_songs} minutes from 2-minute songs.
So far, his playlist lasts for {playtime_3_min_songs} + {playtime_2_min_songs} = <<{playtime_3_min_songs}+{playtime_2_min_songs}={current_playlist_duration}>>{current_playlist_duration} minutes.

He therefore still needs {total_run_duration} minutes for his run - {current_playlist_duration} minutes current playtime = <<{total_run_duration}-{current_playlist_duration}={minutes_needed}>>{minutes_needed} minutes.
